tool_description: Check email addresses in real-time to verify their existence and validity. This ensures that a mailbox exists and is active, helping to maintain the integrity of your user database.
name: Email Validator
title: Email Validator

api_list.name: No FreeEmail
api_list.description: The custodian of your professional standards. This endpoint ensures that only business and non-free email addresses make it through your registration process. It checks an email query parameter and reports back whether it belongs to a free provider or not, helping you maintain the integrity of your user base.

api_list.name: Fast Validator
api_list.description:
Your personal sentinel against invalid email addresses. It tirelessly checks whether an email exists, is active, and not disposable. 
Feed it an **email **query parameter and in return, it will provide detailed insights about the email address, including its status and the reason behind it.
